name: Contracted (itch) (Selayar Lautan)
description:
A specimen had broken out from the its container. It needs to suck life essence from other  beings to survive. Unaware to this, the lab started to deploy guards to kill the specimen.

You will be playing as the specimen. Use your mouse to control it. Avoid bullets and try to survive as long as possible. Remember, you need to suck life essence, so don't get to far away. You could also attack a guard with a right click, by doing so, you will gain a full health, but the guard would be aggressive and started to attack nearby guards, risking you to loose nearby guards as your supplement. Good luck

Controls:

  •  Mouse Movement (movement)
  • Right Click (attack)

Preview:

This was supposed to be a submission for the Individual Game Jam CSUI 2020, but I couldn't make it in time, so I would release it separately.
